title: Test Entry 3
body:
This is the first journal entry that has some body. Again, it's not yet generated by Hugo, but I'm starting to solidify what an entry looks like.

So right now I'm writing Markdown directly into a JSON object. It makes sense, I think. At the end of this, I'll be able to push a new markdown file to a folder in Git, rebuild the site, and we're done. i think. We'll see.
